; DO NOT EDIT OR DELETE THIS SCRIPT TO CIRCUMVENT WARNINGS
; THINGS WILL BREAK DOWN IF YOU DO NOT INSTALL ALL OF THE REQUIREMENTS
; DO NOT ASSUME THAT IT IS FINE JUST BECAUSE YOUR GAME DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY CRASH

; NVSE Plugin Checks
if GetPluginVersion "hNVSE" < 1.20
	MessageBoxEx "Missing hVNSE plugin version >=1.20. Installed version: %g This is not a bug" (GetPluginVersion "hNVSE")
endif

if GetPluginVersion "AnhNVSE" < 1.31
	MessageBoxEx "Missing AnhNVSE plugin version >=1.31. Installed version: %g This is not a bug" (GetPluginVersion "AnhNVSE")
endif

if GetPluginVersion "JIP LN NVSE" < 57.30
	MessageBoxEx "Missing JIP LN NVSE plugin version >=57.30. Installed version: %g This is not a bug" (GetPluginVersion "JIP LN NVSE")
endif

if GetPluginVersion "JohnnyGuitarNVSE" < 5.19
	MessageBoxEx "Missing JohnnyGuitarNVSE plugin version >=5.19. Installed version: %g This is not a bug" (GetPluginVersion "JohnnyGuitarNVSE")
endif

if GetPluginVersion "ShowOffNVSE Plugin" < 1.81
	MessageBoxEx "Missing ShowOffNVSE plugin version >=1.81. Installed version: %g This is not a bug" (GetPluginVersion "ShowOffNVSE Plugin")
endif

; Vanilla Form Patches
SetWorldspaceMapBounds WastelandNV -34 41 38 -31
SetAlly OmertaFaction AZGOMChickHadleyFaction
GenericAddForm 1 Ghoul AZEyeGhoulBlind -2
